UIKit

Class DFNotificationCenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • UIKit.DFNotificationCenter

  • public class DFNotificationCenter
extends java.lang.Object
    DFNotificationCenter - A Notification parser Objects can place calls to register(_:, _:) to register themselves to listen for notifications Objects can place calls to post(_:, _:) to post notifications with optional userData This class is meant to be used for passing information among different packages(modules)

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • addObserver

        @Deprecated
public void addObserver(DFNotificationCenterDelegate object,
                                    java.lang.String notificationName)
        Deprecated. use `register(_:, _:)` instead
        Parameters:
        object - The object that will be receiving the notification. This object must conform to the DFNotificationCenterDelegate interface
        notificationName - The notification name the object wishes to listen for. All other notifications will be ignored

      • register

        public void register(DFNotificationCenterDelegate observer,
                     java.lang.String notificationName)
        Parameters:
        observer - The object that will be receiving the notification. This object must conform to the DFNotificationCenterDelegate interface
        notificationName - The notification name the object wishes to listen for. All other notifications will be ignored

      • remove

        public void remove(DFNotificationCenterDelegate observer,
                   java.lang.String notificationName)
        Parameters:
        observer - The object that was receiving the notification. This object must conform to the DFNotificationCenterDelegate interface
        notificationName - The notification name the object was listening for. All other notifications will be ignored

      • remove

        public void remove(DFNotificationCenterDelegate observer)
        A convenience method for removing all instances of an Object
        Parameters:
        observer - The object that wishes to be removed

      • postNotification

        @Deprecated
public void postNotification(java.lang.String notificationName,
                                         java.lang.Object userData)
        Deprecated. use `post(_:, _:)` instead
        Parameters:
        notificationName - The notification name the object wishes to post for
        userData - Optional data the object calling this function wishes to pass on to any observers

      • post

        public void post(java.lang.String notificationName,
                 java.lang.Object userData)
        Parameters:
        notificationName - The notification name the object wishes to post for
        userData - Optional data the object calling this function wishes to pass on to any observers
